titleStmt.title: An answer of the committee of seventeen representing the East-India Company of the Netherlands given into the States General of the United Provinces in answer to two memorials, the one given by Mr. Chudley, envoy of His Majesty of Great Brittain, and the other given by Mr. Chardyn, touching the affairs of Bantham.
titleStmt.author: Nederlandsche Oost-Indische Compagnie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Paul Matthowson by order of the Governors of the Dutch East-India Company and reprinted by Langley Curtis,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.

person.persName: order of the Governors of the Dutch East-India Company
